messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
There are Pokémon that grow stronger
when it’s raining.
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Like rain, my tears flow from losing...
They call me the Rain Woman...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I want to show off my pretty parasol,
but it will get dirty in the rain.Oh, such a big dilemma!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH: On rainy days, I get more energetic!
